articles.title: What LSU said about eliminating Tennessee baseball from College World Series - 247Sports
articles.description: Tennessee baseball's season came to an end against LSU on Tuesday night at the Men's College World Series in Omaha. Here's everything the Tigers said following the Vols' loss.
articles.content:
Q. Nate, I'm aware you were a starter at Eugene College back in Oklahoma. How much does that prepare you for this moment right now?

articles.title: Joc Pederson, Giants walk off Padres in 9th straight win - MLB.com
articles.description:
SAN FRANCISCO -- The Giants, quite literally, walked off the Padres on Tuesday night at Oracle Park.
Joc Pederson crushed a game-tying home run in the eighth inning and then drew a bases-loaded walk off Padres closer Josh Hader with two outs in the bottom of …

articles.title: Jordan Montgomery and Dylan Carlson set tone as Cardinals win fourth in a row, 9-3 over Nationals - St. Louis Post-Dispatch
articles.description: Dylan Carlson had two home runs and Jordan Montgomery held the Nationals to one run over seven innings as the Cardinals won their fourth in a row.
